title: I don't know about anywhere else but Zed is well approaching 75% pick rate in Team Builder
body: Getting really sick of this ninja fuck.  I guess the upside is I've got the Kassadin/Zed match-up down pat.

replies.body:
Well over half approaching 75%? What does *that* mean? Approaching half of 75% would be 36.5%...

I think you may want to clarify what you mean. :P

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WYWv8ERb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-08T21:00:28.599+0000)
>
> Well over half approaching 75%? What does *that* mean? Approaching half of 75% would be 36.5%...
> 
> I think you may want to clarify what you mean. :P

An artifact of the topic length limit.  Should have been seperated by a comma and an and.
Zed is fun to play. Teambuilder is the "I want to play what I find fun" mode, so not too surprising honestly.

> [{quoted}](name=CynicalGiant,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WYWv8ERb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-08T22:19:36.450+0000)
>
> Zed is fun to play. Teambuilder is the "I want to play what I find fun" mode, so not too surprising honestly.

Yeah pretty fun to pop everyone with no counterplay. "Zhonyas counters Zed" Him and every other champion...

I don't think this includes me. Why does everyone think zed is so bad? There are many other useful bans I'd rather choose than a ban full of mid champs. Think of the other lanes that will face trouble if they have let's say blitz and you don't have a morg. I'd say 75 percent of the games I play have people constantly picking champs that they think are op against their main champ or just op overall. Plus anyone ever see a Ryze against a zed? Ryze is better than him late game with his tankiness and his stun.
Well theres no ban phase in teambuilder.. So thats where people go to play Zed.
Zed pick rate of 75%?  Nah.  Assassins as a group are probably 75% or maybe a bit higher.

Source?

It wouldn't surprise me because everyone always wants to jump on the OP bandwagon and TB is a great place to learn a new champion, but I pretty much always queue mid in TB and it doesn't feel like I'm playing against Zeds 75% of the time.

The more you don't want a thing to happen, more are the chances it will actually happen.

Many players play champions who are defined by the community OP, therefore their popularity will increase, like Riven and Zed.
I agree Zed's strong and all, but never use Teambuilder to cite... well anything
